Star Wars™: The Old Republic™
Collector's Edition Items

Thank you for buying the Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ Collector's Edition.
Enclosed are the special in-game items to which your purchase entitles you. Use them to customize your character and show them off to other players!
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
Digital Deluxe Edition Items

Thank you for buying the Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ Digital Deluxe Edition.
Enclosed are the special in-game items to which your purchase entitles you. Use them to customize your character and show them off to other players!
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
Pre-Order Bonus Item

Thank you for pre-ordering Star Wars™: The Old Republic™.
Enclosed is the special color crystal to which your purchase entitles you. Use it to customize the color of your lightsaber or blaster!
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
Star Wars™: The Old Republic™
Your Legacy is now unlocked!

You've now unlocked your legacy. For now, you can choose a unique last name that is shared across all of your characters. In the future, the legacy system will offer even more benefits to all of the characters in your legacy!
Razer Bonus Item

Thank you for the purchase of an official Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ Razer-brand peripheral.
Enclosed are the special color crystals to which your purchase entitles you. Use them to customize the color of your lightsaber or blaster. May the Force™ be with you!
Item Recovery

We have detected that this character has been affected by an issue on character load that resulted in the game needing to grant or return items to this character. Attached to this email you will find the associated items. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
May the Force™ be with you!
-The Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ Team
Founder of the Old Republic

Thank you for being one of the first subscribers to Star Wars™: The Old Republic™.
Enclosed is a special in-game item to reward you for being with us since the very beginning. Use this item to grant your character the title ", Founder" and show your status to other players!
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
You can't send mail to characters of the opposite faction unless they are in your Legacy.
You can't send Legacy-bound items to characters who are not part of your Legacy.
You are not allowed to send mail from a trial account.
The First Line of Defense

Thank you for participating on Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ Public Test.
Enclosed is a special in-game item to reward you for achieving level 10 on Star Wars: The Old Republic Public Test. Use this item to grant your character the title "the First Line of Defense" and show your status to other players!
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
The Cutting Edge

Thank you for participating on Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ Public Test.
Enclosed is a special in-game item to reward you for completing Act I on Star Wars: The Old Republic Public Test. Use this item to grant your character the title "the Cutting Edge" and show your status to other players!
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
Happy Birthday!

Today is your birthday, and in honor of the occasion, we're sending you a gift!
Enclosed is an in-game item to help you celebrate. Use it to view a special message--and messenger--and show it off to your friends.
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
Event Bonus Item

You've successfully redeemed your Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ event code!
Enclosed is a special in-game item for your enjoyment.
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!

Thank you for being part of the Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ "Legacy" game update.
Enclosed is a special in-game reward as our thanks for helping us make the Legacy launch so successful! Your new "Legacy Tauntaun Ram" pet will follow you loyally as you and your friends continue your adventures.
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
Legacy Item Reward

Congratulations on unlocking your Legacy!
Here's an Inheritance Mainhand Weapon Construction Kit to help you get started with your Legacy. Legacy construction kits can be traded to vendors on your capital world for Legacy gear. Legacy weapons and armor are powerful low level items that are acquired through high level activities.
As a Bind on Legacy item, you can mail this construction kit to any of your characters. Bind on Legacy items can be identified by the shield in the upper right corner of their icon.
Friends of SWTOR Reward

The friend you referred has subscribed to Star Wars™: The Old Republic™. Please accept this gift as our way of saying "thanks!"
Enclosed is a special in-game item to reward you for your support. Use this item to add the Kurtob Alliance Speeder to your collection of vehicles and ride around the galaxy in style!
Have fun--and May the Force™ be with you!
Strike Team Specialist

Thank you for participating on Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ Public Test.
Enclosed is a special in-game item to reward you for testing the Group Finder on Star Wars: The Old Republic Public Test. Use this item to grant your character the title "Strike Team Specialist" and show your status to other players!
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
Strike Team Commander

Thank you for participating on Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ Public Test.
Enclosed is a special in-game item to reward you for further testing the Group Finder on Star Wars: The Old Republic Public Test. Your continued dedication to testing helps us create the best possible system for your enjoyment. Use this item to grant your character the title "Strike Team Commander" and show your status to other players!
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
Character Transfer Rewards Available

All of your characters on this server are eligible for our free Character Transfer Service.
Transfer your character by July 30th to receive an exclusive in-game pet, the Gannifari and 25 Black Hole commendations!
For more information regarding this service, please visit www.swtor.com/transfer .
May the Force™ be with you!
Your Transfer Rewards

Congratulations, all players on this server are awarded an in-game Gannifari pet and 25 Black Hole commendations!
Thank you for your continued support!
Attached to this email we have included your in-game rewards.
For more information regarding this service and the rewards, please visit www.swtor.com/transfer
May the Force™ be with you!
Downgrade Item Recovery
We were unable to place these items in your inventory due to space constraints when removing equipment from your character as part of the downgrade process.

To send mail you must be a Subscriber or have Preferred Player Status.
Perferred Player Status is granted to anyone who makes a purchase of Cartel Coins, Subscription or game time.
You may only send one item per message and you may not attach Credits. Subscribe today to send Credits and up to 8 items to other players!
Downgrade Item Recovery

Unlock: Inventory Module Failure

Due to a problem with your transaction, your additional Inventory Module request has failed. Any items placed in the additional slots have been returned to your inventory. Any items that did not fit in your available inventory space can be seen as attachments to this message. The Cartel Coins for this purchase have been refunded to your available balance OR you will find the Unlock: Inventory Module item in your inventory.

HK-51
Equipment Acquisition

[Courtesy] Greetings, Master!
[Explanation] I have taken the liberty of acquiring several components and accessories that will increase my efficiency by a truly impressive margin. Thanks to my advanced negotiation heuristics, these items have been acquired at no cost to you!
[Request] Please see that these upgrades are installed at the earliest possible opportunity, Master. It would surely be in your best interests for me to operate at peak effectiveness.

Classic Equipment Items

Greetings!
We have detected you have one or more pieces of armor affected by a recent change we made to its appearance in Patch 1.6.2. Attached to this message are the original versions of those armor pieces. These "Classic" pieces are not bound to your character and may be sold or traded to others. Both versions of these items are also available in the Space Pirate Cartel Pack.
Please note that any affected items posted to the Galactic Trade Network before the recent maintenance will be returned to you. The "Classic" items will also be attached to that mail.
May the Force™ be with you!

Seeker Droid Item
The attached item was retrieved by your Seeker Droid while your inventory was full.
Thank you for your purchase of Star Wars™: The Old Republic™- Rise of the Hutt Cartel.

Enclosed are your special pre-order item rewards as a thank you for your purchase! Simply click on the items to accept them and have fun as you continue your adventure in Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
Welcome to Rise of the Hutt Cartel!

You now have access to the Digital Expansion: Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
Advance to Level 55 and access the planet of Makeb--a world on the brink of destruction, ruled by the ruthless Hutt Cartel! Embark on a story-driven adventure to uncover the mystery behind the conflict of Makeb. Along the way, you will jump into missions using two new technology devices--Macrobinoculars and Seeker Droids--that offer you valuable benefits and rewards!
To start your journey, once you've reached Level 50, click on your ship's Holoterminal to begin your Rise of the Hutt Cartel adventures!
NOTE: Although completion of your Chapter 3 class story arc isn't required, the storyline will contain spoilers for anyone who hasn't done so.
Enjoy, and may the Force™ be with you!

Welcome to Galactic Starfighter - Subscriber Early Access. Your rewards are here!

Thank you for being part of our new Galactic Starfighter community! You have received special Starship rewards. As a Subscriber on November 1, 2013, you are receiving a Gunship Early Unlock and the "Daring" series of exclusive paint jobs (Republic and Imperial versions). Additionally, as a Subscriber on December 3, 2013, you also receive exclusive paint jobs for the Scout and Strike Fighter (Republic and Imperial versions). To claim these items you must visit the Galactic Starfighter Hangar by logging into the game, locating the in-game mini-map on the lower right corner of your screen, and clicking on the Starship icon on the left side of the map. We also have four pilot suits and two titles waiting for you which can be claimed via this email by right clicking on each item below to accept them into your Inventory. Then get ready to take your battle to space in our Galactic Starfighter Digital Expansion!

Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!

Welcome to Shadow of Revan

Congratulations! You now have access to the Shadow of Revan Digital Expansion.
Your epic new story and advancement to Level 60 start with the Forged Alliances prologue, which introduces you to powerful new allies who join you on a deadly course through iconic worlds in order to stop an emerging galactic threat!
Next, travel to Rishi, a tropical pirate haven at the edge of the galaxy where a grand mystery awaits and chaos abounds--all leading to the imposing jungles of Yavin 4 and the final fate of the Order of Revan!
To begin this next stage in your saga, activate your ship's Mission Console once you've reached Level 55 and select "Shadow of Revan: Prelude".
SPOILER WARNING: The Forged Alliances and Shadow of Revan storylines contain spoilers for anyone who has not completed pre-55 content.
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!

Your Nico Okarr Companion!

Your Nico Okarr Companion is here!
As part of the Premium Player rewards program, you have unlocked the legendary gunslinger Companion, Nico Okarr. An infamous smuggler with a bottomless bag of tricks, Nico is the perfect ally for a tight spot.
You can encounter Nico and learn more about him after completing Chapter Nine of Knights of the Fallen Empire, but if you'd like to begin traveling with him immediately, you can use the attached item to unlock Nico as a Companion at any time. Using this item will not prevent you from playing through his recruitment mission.
Nico disappeared from the Galactic stage after the return of the Sith Empire. However, there have been sightings of a man fitting Nico's description frequenting cantinas across Wild Space. If anyone can convince the captain of the Redshifter to come out of retirement, it's you! Keep an eye out for him during your adventure!
May the Force™ be with you!

Welcome to Knights of the Fallen Empire

Congratulations! You now have access to the Knights of the Fallen Empire Digital Expansion.
For those still preparing to battle the galaxy's newest threat, the Eternal Empire, we've streamlined our core leveling experience tremendously--not only will you level faster, but your adventures focus on those missions that truly define your character.
If you can't wait to experience the storyline for Knights of the Fallen Empire, we've given all our subscribers the ability to create a new level 60 character for free. You can do so at Character Select.
For those of you who already have a level 60 character and have completed your class story arc, your epic adventure continues as you travel deep into Wild Space and witness the power of the Eternal Empire firsthand! Will you be able to stop this mysterious new enemy?
But you won't have to face it alone--your Companions are more powerful than ever. Not only will new personalities join your crew, your Companions also have the ability to adapt to whatever needs you have, be it as a tank, a healer, or a damage dealer.
When you're ready to face the Eternal Empire, go to your ship's Mission Console.
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!

Congratulations Heroes and Champions!
As a way of saying thanks for your contributions to Answers HQ, you've been granted access to a very special exclusive pet. You should find it attached to the mail; be sure to show it off!
We are extremely grateful for the assistance you give to the community over on AHQ. We hope this gift will go some way to showing our appreciation for what the best of our community members can achieve.
Thank you again and may the Force™ be with you!
The AHQ Team
AHQ Exclusive Pet

Thank you for being part of the Knights of the Fallen Empire community!
As part of the Subscriber Rewards promotion, you will be able to recruit HK-55 as your Companion! As your loyal bodyguard and personal Assassin Droid, HK-55 is sure to be a prized addition to your Alliance.
To recruit HK-55, you must first complete Chapters 1-9 in Knights of the Fallen Empire as well as the first Alliance Alert mission "To Find a Findsman." Then, look for the HK-55 "Arma Rasa" Alliance Alert that puts you on a mission to recruit HK-55. To see Alliance Alerts, click "N" to open your Companions and Contacts window and check the Alerts tab.
Good luck embarking on your recruitment mission!
May the Force™ be with you!

Your HK-55-Inspired Ship Droid Customization

Thank you for being part of the Knights of the Fallen Empire community!
As part of the Subscriber Rewards promotion, you have received the new HK-55-inspired Ship Droid Customizations! Whether you're heading into battle with the courageous C2-N2 or the fearless 2V-R8, you can equip them with the awe-inspiring likeness of your favorite new Assassin Droid!
Please follow the steps below to claim your in-game rewards:
1. Right click on the two items below to accept them into your inventory. 2. Next, click on the Companions and Contacts icon in your Menu Bar (or press 'N' by default on your keyboard), locate either C2-N2 or 2V-R8 in the Followers list, and summon them as your Companion. ** Reminder: You will not be able to summon either Ship Droid if you are on your Player Ship. 3. Now open your Character Sheet by either clicking the icon on your Menu Bar or pressing 'C' (by default) on your keyboard, and select the Companion tab at the bottom of this screen. 4. Either right click on the reward in your inventory or drag your new reward into your Ship Droid's Customization slot to equip the item.
May the Force™ be with you!

Welcome to Knights of the Eternal Throne

Congratulations! You now have access to the Knights of the Eternal Throne Digital Expansion.
For those of you who already have a level 65 character and have completed Knights of the Fallen Empire, your epic adventure continues as you lead the armies of the Alliance against the evil Eternal Empire and its ruthless new leader, Empress Vaylin!
If you do not have a level 65 character, we've given all our subscribers the ability to jump right into the action of Knights of the Eternal Throne with a new character at level 65. You can do so at Character Select.
If you want to experience the epic saga from the very beginning, subscribers also have the ability to create a level 60 character and start the Outlander's adventure in Knights of the Fallen Empire.
When you're ready to begin the fight for the Eternal Throne, click the PLAY button or use the Chapters menu (default Shift + E to open).
Have fun, and may the Force™ be with you!
Your New Reward!

As part of the Premium Player rewards program, you have unlocked the legendary gunslinger Companion, Nico Okarr. An infamous smuggler with a bottomless bag of tricks, Nico is the perfect ally for a tight spot.
You can encounter Nico and learn more about him after completing Chapter Nine of Knights of the Fallen Empire, but if you'd like to begin traveling with him immediately, you can use the attached item to unlock Nico as a Companion at any time. Nico disappeared from the Galactic stage after the return of the Sith Empire. However, there have been sightings of a man fitting Nico's description frequenting cantinas across Wild Space. If anyone can convince the captain of the Redshifter to come out of retirement, it's you! Keep an eye out for him during your adventure!
May the Force™ be with you!
